title: krishnaverma
author: krishnaverma
created_time: January 05, 2023, 01:15:38 PMLast edit: January 05, 2023, 04:44:23 PM by krishnaverma
content: I had been an active member here. Have resumed posting here again regularly from some time. I am rentingSignatureCurrently available for rentAvatarWill be available on reaching full member rankReached full member rank on 5-1-2023. So now avatar is available for rent. Personal TextCurrently available for rentPriceOpen to offersI will update availability as a response to this thread or as an edit to this OP. You can offer me payment per post. I am also open to weekly, monthly or yearly payment for all the three above separately or together. Payment to be made in Bitcoin. You can agree to an amount in dollars but I would prefer to be paid in bitcoin. I will prefer long term deals here. I plan to be very active here on bitcointalk now. You can find my posts hereLatest posts made by mehttps://bitcointalk.org/index.php?action=profile;u=1341921;sa=showPostsLatest threads started by mehttps://bitcointalk.org/index.php?action=profile;threads;u=1341921;sa=showPostsWill only advertise services that follow forum rules. If I start advertising something that turns out to be scam later, I will discontinue advertising.

comments.author: Adbitco
comments.body: You have made a good offer but btw I would also advise you to put more effort to achieve a higher rank with your current rank you have a very slim chance to be accepted in any projects as most of the managers don't actually accept member ranks rather from Full member. So if I were you I would work to attain a Sir member rank before posting this services.

comments.author: krishnaverma
comments.body: Quote from: Adbitco on January 05, 2023, 01:38:26 PMYou have made a good offer but btw I would also advise you to put more effort to achieve a higher rank with your current rank you have a very slim chance to be accepted in any projects as most of the managers don't actually accept member ranks rather from Full member. So if I were you I would work to attain a Sir member rank before posting this services.I am in no hurry. This post will be live with my progress here.

comments.author: White pawn
comments.body: Your avatar space couldn’t possibly be available for rent as you’re currently in the member rank. Members can’t post avatars on their profile. Member ranks don’t have an avatar space.

comments.author: krishnaverma
comments.body: Quote from: White pawn on January 05, 2023, 02:04:10 PMMembers can’t post avatars on their profile. Member ranks don’t have an avatar space. Thanks for reminding me. I have corrected OP.

comments.author: aioc
comments.body: Quote from: krishnaverma on January 05, 2023, 01:15:38 PMI had been an active member here. Have resumed posting here again regularly from some time. You are so active, also active on burst posting, this kind of posting habit is not acceptable to any bounty manager 2 minutes gaps on every post.QuoteWill only advertise services that follow forum rules. If I start advertising something that turns out to be scam later, I will discontinue advertising. You should practice what you preached you are breaking forum rules by spamming and burst posting

comments.author: krishnaverma
comments.body: Quote from: aioc on January 05, 2023, 02:56:25 PMYou should practice what you preached you are breaking forum rules by spamming and burst postingI give less than an hour in total daily on bitcointalk. I think many members are much more active than that here. I still consider your opinion important and will try to correct this.

comments.author: aioc
comments.body: Quote from: krishnaverma on January 05, 2023, 03:16:58 PMQuote from: aioc on January 05, 2023, 02:56:25 PMYou should practice what you preached you are breaking forum rules by spamming and burst postingI give less than an hour in total daily on bitcointalk. I think many members are much more active than that here. I still consider your opinion important and will try to correct this. Then lock this thread and create another one after a month or better join a signature campaign with strict rules and try to rank you can have a better deal if you are a veteran of signature campaigns or have a good rank, I seldom see a lower rank offering a signature for rent but if this what you want then good luck, looking forward to evaluating you after a month.

comments.author: Lucius
comments.body: As many as 12 threads so far today, and 90% of them are low-value and zero-effort copy-pasting. If you continue like this, you will not achieve anything of what you have planned, but the exact opposite - some members will put you on ignore, and others will often use the "report to moderator" button.Being active and being active with quality content are two different things.

comments.author: krishnaverma
comments.body: Quote from: Lucius on January 05, 2023, 03:53:49 PMAs many as 12 threads so far today, and 90% of them are low-value and zero-effort copy-pasting. If you continue like this, you will not achieve anything of what you have planned, but the exact opposite - some members will put you on ignore, and others will often use the "report to moderator" button.I will try to improve based on feedback.

comments.author: T3PR00T
comments.body: Do you really think you are worth to get such privilege? You still have a long way to earn it.

comments.body: I wish you all the best for this.

comments.author: krishnaverma
comments.body: Quote from: CCMS on March 06, 2024, 08:05:20 AMI wish you all the best for this. Thanks a lot.Signature and avatar currently available.

comments.author: acquia
comments.body: I want to try your service but it seems you are just not welcoming some customers politely.But still thanks for the info, I'm a bit disappointed now, but at first I'm trying to consider if you could help me out to increase the views some of my youtube videos. I'm still going to follow this thread and look if someone that will avail your service and have a good feedback to you. Good luck to your service!

Maybe you are only open to special offers? Anyway good luck.

comments.author: JollyGood
comments.body: The OP has received a badge for responsibly disclosed forum security flaws therefore it is a possibility his posting pattern (and somewhat low quality contributions) is a result of him believing he could leverage the badge against quality posting therefore plagiarism on his part. With that, he probably thought he would have entitlement to participate in campaigns. I am fairly sure two campaign managers would probably never hire him but two would consider it (and one in particular).Quote from: Lucius on January 05, 2023, 03:53:49 PMAs many as 12 threads so far today, and 90% of them are low-value and zero-effort copy-pasting. If you continue like this, you will not achieve anything of what you have planned, but the exact opposite - some members will put you on ignore, and others will often use the "report to moderator" button.Being active and being active with quality content are two different things.
